en: Saya tak nak duduk di sini.

What do you have in Form 5?

en: Kamu cakap begitu semasa di tingkatan tiga.

en: Keputusan 6A dia hampir tak diterima di sekolah ini.

Tak guna kalau Jaja ada kakak yang jadi pelajar cemerlang.
vi: It's no use if Jaja has a sister who is the topper of her batch.

vi: Sure, you're the topper of your batch every year.

en: Tapi kalau kamu masih tak boleh tolong Jaja, kamu apa?
vi: But if you still can't help Jaja, what does that make you?

en: Cerialah. Hari ini hari pertama persekolahan.

-I have a lot of things to tell you. -What is it?

en: - Macam mana dia boleh jadi lebih kacak?
vi: How did he become more handsome?

en: Nanti ada masalah, kau cari siapa?
vi: Who'll help you if you get in trouble?
Why are you digging your pockets?

en: Aku cari kad tambah nilai aku. Sekejap.
vi: I'm looking for my top-up card. Hold on.

en: Atau tercicir semasa bertembung dengan si gila itu?
vi: Did I drop it when I bumped into that crazy girl?

en: - Si gila mana? - Aaidaa Zubir, siapa lagi?
vi:
Who's that crazy girl?
 Aaidaa Zubir, who else?
Hey, is it the cute one?

en: - Ke mana? - Cari kad tambah nilai.
vi: -Where are you going? -Looking for my top-up card.

en: Aku belum beritahu mak aku yang aku dah sampai.
vi: I haven't told my mom that I have arrived.

en: Kau naik bas lagi untuk ke sini, Aizat?
vi: Did you take the bus to come here, Jat?

en: Aku lebih rela naik bas daripada duduk dalam kereta ibu bapa selama tiga jam.
vi: I'd rather take the bus than be stuck in my parents' car for three hours.

en: Mereka cuma cakap tentang JPA, biasiswa, MARA dan SPM.
vi: All they talk about is JPA, scholarships, MARA, and SPM.

en: Kau kena bersyukur, Aizat. Ibu bapa kau tak kisah pun.
vi: You have to be grateful, Jat. Your parents don't really care.

en: Sekarang, dijemput Pengetua STIA untuk beri ucapan.
vi:
308 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 Now we present the Principal of STIA for his speech.

en: Selamat pulang kepada seluruh warga STIA!
seronok dan bersuka ria sepanjang cuti sekolah, bukan?
vi: so much fun during your school holidays, right?

en: semua perangai buruk kamu di rumah.
selamat datang ke STIA, Cameron Highlands.
Saya percaya anda bangga dengan pencapaian anda setakat ini.
vi: I'm sure you're all proud of your achievements so far.

en: Masing-masing merupakan jaguh kampung yang telah berjaya
vi: Each of you is a big fish in a small pond
from your hometown who managed to score 5As

en: dan melayakkan diri untuk menyertai kami,
vi: and you're qualified to join us,
a prestigious school in this country.

en: biar saya pecahkan tembelang anda sekarang.
vi: let me break it to you right now.

en: Anda berada di sini hanya kerana tuah.
vi: You're only here purely by luck.

en: Kerana UPSR itu hanya peperiksaan tuah.
vi: UPSR is an exam of sheer luck.

en: Rata-rata anda di sini hanya bertuah kerana dilahirkan sebagai Bumiputera.
vi: Most of you here are only lucky because you were born as a Bumiputera.
Born in the countryside, the suburbs.

en: Anda mungkin bertuah kerana hanya lebih pandai sedikit
vi: And you might be lucky because you're only slightly smarter

en: daripada rakan-rakan di kampung halaman anda.
vi: than your peers in your hometown.

en: sama ada anda pelajar yang benar-benar pintar
atau anda hanya di sini kerana takdir
vi: or you're here only because of fate
and will end up as a burden.

en: Beban bagi sekolah, beban bagi STIA.
vi: A burden for the school, a burden for STIA.
to put the average grade for STIA

en: pada aras tertinggi di negara ini.
vi: at the highest level in this nation.

en: Hei, Pawang tak beri peluang kepada pelajar baharu.
vi: Hey, Pawang is not giving any chances to the freshmen.

en: Atau lebih tepat dan tegas lagi, amaran.
vi: Or strictly, more suitably, a warning.

en: dengan mana-mana pelajar yang akan menjadi batu penghalang bagi STIA

en: yang telah menjadi tradisi di sekolah ini.
vi: which has become a tradition for this school.
the Head Prefect of STIA, Mr. Nor Hilmi Zulkarnain.

en: Terima kasih, Pengetua Awang, para guru yang dikasihi
vi: Thank you, Principal Awang, honorable teachers,

en: dan adik-beradik saya yang berlainan ibu bapa,
vi: and my brothers and sisters from another mother,

en: Tak banyak yang saya nak cakap,
vi: I don't have much to say

en: kami berikrar untuk terus majukan nama STIA!
vi: we vow to uphold the school name!

en: Bagi rakan-rakan yang sama tahun dengan saya,
vi: For the students in my batch this year,

FEBRUARY 2003, 265 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 FEBRUARY 2003, 239 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 MARCH 2003, 219 DAYS UNTIL SPM

APRIL 2003, 219 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 MAY 2003, 190 DAYS UNTIL SPM

189 DAYS UNTIL SPM
 Terrible results, terrible discipline.

en: Cuba awak beri saya alasan kenapa saya tak patut buang awak sekarang?

Hey, could you close the door carefully?

en: Tombol pintu itu lebih tua daripada saya.
vi: That doorknob is older than me.
Your friend, Aizat, is on his third case.

en: - Saya boleh buang dia. - Berilah mereka satu lagi peluang.
vi:
I can expel him.
 Give them just one more chance.

en: Saya sendiri akan jamin mereka takkan ada kes lagi.
vi: I myself will guarantee that they will not have a case anymore.

en: Kalau cikgu buang saya, siapa yang ketuai pasukan untuk menang esok?
vi: If you expel me, who would lead the team to win tomorrow?
It's the final match against SSG.
What are you trying to do?

en: Maksud dia, kalau cikgu beri dia satu lagi peluang,
vi: He meant that if you give him one more chance,

en: dia akan berhabis-habisan esok untuk tebus kesalahan dia.
vi: he will play his hardest tomorrow to redeem his wrongs.
I will give you a chance then.
you have to win tomorrow's game.

en: saya nak tengok kamu dapat sekurang-kurangnya 6A.
vi: I want to see you score at least 6As.
No, 8As for your SPM Trial Exam.

en: Kalau satu pun awak tak boleh buat,
saya tak nampak kenapa saya perlu kekalkan awak di sekolah ini.
vi: I don't see why I need to keep you here at this school.

en: - Senang saja. - Tapi "Pe" untuk Perlis pun boleh.
vi: -It's easy. -But "Pe" can be for Perlis too.

en: Daa, kita nak duduki peperiksaan percubaan atau masuk pertandingan menghafal?

Rather than giving me vitamins ABCD,

vi: why not just give me A, B, C, D?

vi: Just give me these signals in the examination hall.
What should we do then, Aaidaa?
I'm stupid, do you know that?

en: Bukan semua orang dilahirkan genius macam kau.
vi: Not everyone was born a genius like you.

en: Aku rasa arwah mak kau pandai.
vi: I think your late mom was intelligent.

en: Sebab kalau ayah betul-betul pandai, aku akan mewarisinya, bukan?
vi: Because if Dad is really intelligent, I would inherit that, right?
Okay, try telling him that. Can you?

en: Kau pandai, cuma kau kena rajin sedikit.
vi: You're smart, so you just need to work hard.

en: Aaidaa, kalau aku terkorban di dewan peperiksaan nanti,

Peace be upon you and God's mercy.

10 DAYS UNTIL SPM TRIAL EXAM
 Jaja!
Jat, are you ready for the trial exams?
You guys are not relaxed. Just relax.

You don't need to worry, seriously.
Elly Azreen said hi to you.
What are you waiting for? Make a move!

Of course there is. You don't have to know.

It's a waste of time, Jaja.

Look at this.
 This is yours.
This is you and this is me.

vi: I don't know about you, but I'm nervous.

en: Bukan buang masa tengok budak lelaki berasak, okey?
vi: Don't waste your time watching boys scuffle, okay?

vi: Your field is not up to standard.

en: Saya faham para pelajar awak manja.

Kau mati, kau mati Kami hidup, kami hidup

 Hey, I don't understand what I'm doing right now.
What's the use of this formula?
I don't understand the context at all!
You don't have to understand that.
You just need to solve it.

en: Macam mana aku nak selesaikan sesuatu yang aku tak faham?
vi: How can I solve something that I don't understand?
What is this? What should I integrate?
They shouldn't do it to this extent.

en: Aku nak kau tiup lampu ini sampai ia padam.
vi: I want you to blow this lamp until it turns off.

en: Kau kena tolong bunuh aku sekarang. Tolonglah bunuh aku!
vi: You have to kill me now, please.

en: Baru belajar sehari, sudah buat masalah.
vi: You've only been studying for a day.

en: Aku dah jadi kawan kau sejak hari pertama di tingkatan satu.
vi: Jokes aside, I've been your friend since the first day of Form 1.

en: Aku nak raikan hari terakhir di tingkatan lima dengan kau.
vi: I want to celebrate the last day of Form 5 with you.

en: Itu nama kekasih kau dalam dompet kau?
vi: Is that the name of your girlfriend in your wallet?

en: Kita dah lama berkawan. Kau tak pernah tunjuk kepada aku.
vi: We've been friends for so long. You haven't shown it to me.

en: Baiklah, tak apalah kalau tak nak tunjuk.
vi: Fine, you don't have to show it to me.
That's enough, Hilmi. What's wrong with you?
He managed to turn it off. That's enough.

en: Kau tahu kenapa kau di sini?
vi: Do you know why you're here?
Because I told the warden that my batchmate was stealing.

en: saya beritahu warden yang rakan sekelas saya mencuri.
Pelajar STIA setia kepada kawan dan takkan laporkan.
vi: STIA students are loyal to friends and won't snitch.

en: Bukannya tak boleh laporkan kepada sesiapa.
vi: It's not like you can't report it to anyone.

en: Tapi laporkan kepada aku, bukan warden.
vi: But you have to tell me, okay? Not the warden.

en: Tak kasihankan kawan kau kalau dia dibuang sekolah?
vi: Don't you have pity for your friend if he gets expelled?
STIA students are loyal to friends.

en: Daa. Mereka simbah air pada kau?
vi: Daa! They threw water at you?

en: Kau kawan aku, tapi Aaidaa kakak aku. Faham?
vi: You're my friend, but Aaidaa is my sister. Got that?

en: Kakak kau rosakkan tahun kita. Dia rosakkan permainan kita!
vi: Your sister ruined our batch. She ruined our game!

en: Kalau tak nak kena tampar, jangan cari masalah dengan dia!
vi: Don't mess with her or I'll slap you!
Jaja, where did you find them?

en: Ada dengan budak-budak yang takut aku tampar mereka.
vi: They're with the kids who were afraid I'd slap them.

en: Tiada apa yang aku tak sanggup buat untuk kau.
vi:
No worries.
 There's nothing I wouldn't do for you.

vi: How do you do the sign for A, B, C, D again?
Hey, why are you talking to yourself?

vi: The kids in our dorm want to borrow his guitar, they want to jam.
Aren't you guys in a jam?
I don't do drugs, Zaim. I don't.
Hey, this is a leaked exam paper.

vi: I paid RM200 to get this thing.

en: Aku perlu pastikan aku dapat balik duit.
vi: I need to get my money's worth.

 Your biology exam will start at 10 a.m.

in this year's trial exams

vi: Do you think you're the only one who knows sign language for the deaf?

vi: They've changed the seating chart. How can I read your signals then?

en: Jaja, aku tak nak buat lagi. Belajarlah!
vi: Jaja, no more of that. You have to study!
You! Without proof, don't even think about it.

en: Hei, kau nak lari ke mana?

vi: Why would you do that to Aaidaa?

Come on, Jat.
 Aaidaa is a good student.

en: Dulu, kau tak terfikir nak pertahankan dia semasa dia buat kita kalah dengan SSG.
vi: Back then, you didn't think to defend her when she made us lose against SSG.

en: Patutlah kau tak nak kongsi dengan aku.
vi: That's why you won't share with me.

en: - Simpan dia untuk diri sendiri. - Pulangkan.

Zaim, Botol. Look at Aizat's girlfriend.

en: - Ini tak kelakar. - Dia ada adik?
vi: -This is not funny. -Does she have a sister?
This is not funny, you got that?

en: - Tolonglah, ia tak kelakar. - Tengok ini.
vi: -Come on, it's not funny. -Look at this.
Hey, Aizat! What's wrong with you?

adalah budak yang ada ibu bapa kaya macam kau?
vi: do you mean kids with rich parents like you?

en: Aku boleh buat lebih daripada itu!
vi: I can do much more than that!

I didn't mean it, I swear!
